name: user-office-core
description: This is user office core repository including both backend and frontend.
author: SWAP

scripts.lint: concurrently "npm run lint:backend" "npm run lint:frontend" "npm run lint:e2e"
scripts.lint:fix: concurrently "npm run lint:fix:backend" "npm run lint:fix:frontend" "npm run lint:fix:e2e"
scripts.postinstall: concurrently "npm run install:backend" "npm run install:frontend" "npm run install:e2e"
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:backend" "wait-on --interval 1000 http://127.0.0.1:4000/readiness && npm run dev:frontend"
scripts.dev:backend: cd apps/backend && node ../../copyIfNotExist.js example.development.env .env && npm run dev
scripts.dev:frontend: cd apps/frontend && node ../../copyIfNotExist.js example.development.env .env && npm run dev
scripts.e2e:after:dev: concurrently -k -s first "wait-on --verbose --interval 5000 http://127.0.0.1:4000/readiness && wait-on --verbose --interval 5000 http://127.0.0.1:3000 && cd apps/e2e && npm run cy:run:action" "npm run dev:e2e"
scripts.e2e:after:dev:stfc: concurrently -k -s first "wait-on --verbose --interval 5000 http://127.0.0.1:4000/readiness && wait-on --verbose --interval 5000 http://127.0.0.1:3000 && cd apps/e2e && npm run cy:run:action" "npm run dev:e2e:stfc"
scripts.generate:sdk: concurrently -k -s first "npm run dev:backend" "wait-on http://127.0.0.1:4000/health && npm run generate:shared:types"
